settings.text: A "cassette motor" is a type of hub motor that is designed to be compatible with the existing cassette on the rear wheel of a bicycle. This motor is integrated into the rear wheel hub, directly driving the cassette or freewheel. It's a popular choice for electric bicycle conversions, as it allows the e-bike to maintain its original gearing system. This is suitable for open size of 142mm.

settings.heading: ULTRAMAN COLLECTIONS THE HEROES OF LIGHT IN YOUR MIND
settings.subheading: Explore the Cosmic Saga with Galaxy Versions.We have a lot of other series coming up that will be iterated and updated!
settings.text1: Dive into the cosmic realm with Blokees Ultraman collection. Each mystery box holds the suspense of discovering your favorite heroes, from the Giants of Light in Version  to the captivating legends of Version. Assemble the destiny-altering figures with our DIY Assemble Kit Toy – no glue, no cutters, just pure creative joy.
settings.text2: Officially licensed and suitable for builders aged 12 and up, these figures stand 10 cm tall and feature 20 movable joints for dynamic poses. Join the cosmic adventure and collect all the Ultraman to complete your Ultraman universe!

settings.heading1: Build Your Heroes, No Mess Required!
settings.subheading1: DIY Assemble Kit Toy – Pure Creative Joy for Ages 12 and Up
settings.text1: Experience the thrill of assembling your favorite Ultraman heroes with Blokees DIY Assemble Kit Toy. No messy glue, brushes, or cutters needed—just pure, simple assembly. This kit, designed for ages 12 and up, features 20 moveable joints for dynamic poses straight from the action-packed Ultraman universe. Immerse yourself in the joy of creation without the fuss, and let your creativity shine.
settings.heading2: Officially Licensed Excellence - Blokees Ultraman Collection
settings.subheading2: Unleash the Power of Authenticity and Quality
settings.text2: Discover the universe of Ultraman with confidence, as Blokees proudly presents the officially licensed Ultraman Galaxy Versions 01-06 collection. Our commitment to quality and safety is unwavering, ensuring each figure meets the highest standards in material excellence. Crafted with precision from premium ABS materials, these figures stand as a testament to our dedication to providing a secure and authentic Ultraman experience.
settings.heading3: Galaxy Versions 01-06: Level Up Your Ultraman Collection
settings.subheading3: Collectors and Fans, Assemble! Secure the Complete Set Now
settings.text3: Attention, Ultra-obsessed collectors! Elevate your fandom to warp speed with the MUST-HAVE Galaxy Versions 01-06 collection. These aren't just action figures, they're gateway portals to epic adventures and coveted Ultraman glory.

settings.title: Excellent Gift Idea
settings.context: Gifted to my husband for his birthday. Made him guess the Pokémon by the block colors before he was allowed to have the instruction guide. It was a good ~hour of fun for us. These are pretty simple, but a good value for many. The company makes more complex figures for a higher price that I like a little better, but these are still cute and chibi!

settings.title: Nice Gift
settings.context: Came in time and in perfect condition, excited to give some of these as gifts.

settings.title: Really Nice
settings.context: This was for my husband, he said it was fun to put together, not a bad price, really like it, can buy many more in the future.

settings.title: Great Mini Projects
settings.context: They are as advertised, a small set of 6 figures. They take up to 20 mins to put together.

Join the thriving community of satisfied Blokees builders and share your own epic stories with #BlokeesReviews!

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers Series: Influencer Spotlight
settings.text: Unbox, Build, Battle, and Beyond with Your Favorite Influencers!

settings.block_text: Be part of the Blokees Ultraman community! Share your DIY assembly adventures and display your completed Galaxy Versions using #BlokeesUltraman on social media. Connect with fellow enthusiasts, showcase your creativity, and immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Ultraman.

settings.block_title: What makes Blokees Ultraman Series unique?
settings.block_text: Blokees Ultraman Series stands out for its combination of authenticity and creative design. Each action figure, including Galaxy Versions 01-06, is crafted with precision, capturing the essence of the beloved Ultraman universe. The unique DIY Assemble Kit Toy adds an extra layer of creativity to the collection.

settings.block_title: Are the DIY Assemble Kits suitable for beginners?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! Our DIY Assemble Kits are designed to provide a hassle-free and enjoyable building experience. With no messy glue or complex tools required, they are suitable for users aged 12 and older, offering a perfect balance of challenge and fun.

settings.block_title: What materials are used in the Ultraman Series figures?
settings.block_text: The Ultraman Series figures are made from high-quality ABS material, ensuring durability and safety. Our commitment to quality extends to meeting EU standards, with certifications from CE, RoHS, and SGS, guaranteeing a premium product for our customers.

settings.block_title: Can I purchase individual figures or are they only available in sets?
settings.block_text: Both options are available! You can purchase individual figures or explore the convenience of acquiring sets, including Galaxy Versions 01-06. Mix and match to create your ideal Ultraman collection.

settings.block_title: Are these figures suitable for children?
settings.block_text: Yes, Blokees Ultraman Series figures are suitable for children aged 12 and older. The DIY Assemble Kits provide a fantastic opportunity for young builders to explore their creativity while enjoying the excitement of the Ultraman universe.

settings.block_title: What material are the Ultraman Galaxy Versions 01-06 made of?
settings.block_text: Our Ultraman figures are crafted from high-quality ABS material, ensuring durability and safety for an authentic and enjoyable experience.

settings.block_title: What are the dimensions of the Ultraman Galaxy figures?
settings.block_text: The final figures stand at a height of 13 cm, offering a perfect balance for display and play.

settings.block_title: Is assembly required, and how difficult is it to put together?
settings.block_text: Yes, assembly is required, but fear not! Our figures come with ready-to-assemble small kits designed for easy and enjoyable construction. No messy glue, brushes, or cutters are needed, making it a hassle-free experience.

settings.block_title: Are these figures suitable for display, or are they just toys?
settings.block_text: These figures go beyond mere toys; they are valuable collectibles with incredible display potential. Elevate your Ultraman collection with Galaxy Versions 01-06.
